text: The 1938 Idaho gubernatorial election was held on November 8, 1938. Republican nominee C. A. Bottolfsen defeated Democratic nominee C. Ben Ross with 57.30% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== Major party candidates *C. A. Bottolfsen, Republican *C. Ben Ross, Democratic Other candidates *R. B. Wilson, Independent ===Results=== ==References== 1938 Idaho Gubernatorial
title: 1938 Idaho gubernatorial election
